developer.title: The Developer
developer.bio: Iâ€™m 22 years old, passionate about Java and typed languages, but I believe that "the best language is the one that solves the problem." I started my journey in mobile development, a field I still hold dear. Currently, I work as a full-stack developer, always striving to expand my knowledge and experiment with new technologies.
developer.details: I am constantly improving my skills and exploring concepts like microservices, atomic design, and SOLID principles. I enjoy integrating best practices and modern solutions into the projects I develop, ensuring efficiency and scalability while challenging myself to learn and innovate.

stefanini.description: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django. Integrated and utilized LLM APIs to optimize data analysis.

fxbank.description: Developed a business dashboard to optimize client relationships and transaction tracking. Designed proprietary APIs for automated financial transactions and payment splitting.
